idea-plugin.name: Switch2VSCode
idea-plugin.description:
Switch2VSCode is a JetBrains IDE plugin that lets you open any file or project directly in Visual Studio Code while keeping the caret position.

Key Features

  • Open the current file in VS Code and jump to the same line/column
  • Open the entire project in VS Code
  • Use the same shortcuts as before:
    • Alt/Option+Shift+O - Open current file in VS Code
    • Alt/Option+Shift+P - Open current project in VS Code
  • Access via shortcuts, context menu, or tools menu

Configuration

  • Settings/Preferences â†’ Tools â†’ Switch2VSCode
  • Set VS Code executable path (default is "code")

Requirements

  • Visual Studio Code installed (https://code.visualstudio.com/)
  • Compatible with all JetBrains IDEs
  • Supported IDE versions: 2022.3 and above
